marklogic.body: Your post resonates for me. Different stresses, same response. Life as a working drone, one emergency away from financial disaster, a partner who is emotionally tuned out, a kid in college, a chronic illness... When you say "feed the angry beast"--well, please tell me more. I feed it Ben & Jerry's, Girl Scout cookies, and the like, which have contributed to a post-quit smoking weight Gain of just enough to make my current clothes "a bit pinchy". So yes, I have anger, Yes, I'm an emotional eater, but yes, I also want to manage the weight. I should mention that I'm in my sixties, a former runner who has lost the will to exercise on top of everything else. My hunger game is about outrunning myself, I guess.
